name: umami
description: Umami is a self-hosted, privacy-friendly web analytics platform. It uses a small tracking script and offers clean dashboards, goal tracking, and multi-site support, with an optional hosted cloud service.
features: Web Analytics: Monitor web traffic and user sessions with a GA-like dashboard to easily track conversion, web vitals, and revenue metrics.
Privacy Controls: Ensure GDPR and CCPA compliance with built-in consent management, data anonymization, and configurable retention policies for user data.
Multi-Site Support: Manage analytics for multiple websites from a single dashboard with unified reporting and cross-site comparison capabilities.
Goal Tracking: Define and monitor custom conversion goals with event-based tracking to measure success of key user actions and campaigns.
User Attribution: Track user journeys across devices and sessions with cross-domain tracking, UTM parameters, and referral source attribution for accurate marketing ROI.
Lightweight Tracking: Minimal script size ensures fast page loads without impacting site performance or user experience.
Team Collaboration: Share insights with role-based access controls, collaborative annotations on charts, and scheduled report delivery to keep stakeholders aligned.
API Integrations: Connect with third-party tools via REST APIs, webhooks, and native integrations to centralize data and automate workflows across your stack.
